page.title: 12Reading and Libraries
page.content:
About two thirds of the families do not go to the local libraries but most have newspapers.About half have a daily paper including everything from the Sun to the Observer,Guardian and Times.Far more popular are agricultural and local papers - Mid Wales Journal, Hereford Times, Farmers Weekly, and Shropshire Star are taken in some sort of combination by almost all the families in this school.
Television is very popular despite the fact that a significant proportion (about 30%) get very bad reception and cannot receive, in many cases, all four channels.Despite being in Wales we cannot get Welsh tv services. Listening to the radio is not popular.
